title: How to unsubscribe from Ubisoft+
description: Learn how to cancel your Ubisoft+ subscription, whether you subscribed through the Ubisoft Store, Xbox/Microsoft Store, PlayStation Store, or Amazon Luna. Follow these steps to manage your subscription and avoid future charges.

web.title: Cancel Ubisoft+ Subscription via Website
web.description:
To cancel your Ubisoft+ subscription through the Ubisoft website, follow these steps:

*   Go to the Ubisoft Store.
*   Select the avatar icon at the top-right of the page.
*   Log in to your Ubisoft account.
*   Select the avatar icon again, then select "My Subscription".
*   Select "Cancel Membership".
*   Choose "Yes" to confirm your cancellation.

seo_text: Cancel Ubisoft+ subscription, unsubscribe from Ubisoft+, Ubisoft+ cancellation steps, manage Ubisoft+ subscription, stop Ubisoft+ payments, end Ubisoft+ membership
